long_description: The comfortable JanSport Equinox 22 Pack offers plenty of room for your gear, whether you're traversing campus or tackling your favorite done-in-a-day scramble. Padded shoulder straps and tuck-away hipbelt are made with vented EVA foam; corrugated EVA foam back panel has a vertical ventilation channel and a polyethylene framesheet. Top/panel-loading main compartment contains a hydration sleeve and tube port (reservoir sold separately). Zip-out mesh helmet carrier; side compression straps; webbing daisy chain; trekking-pole holders; webbing bike-light loop; webbing haul handle. The JanSport Equinox 22 Pack features a tricot-lined electronics pocket, front mesh stash pocket, side water-bottle pockets and hipbelt/shoulder strap pockets.
short_description: The comfortable JanSport Equinox 22 Pack offers plenty of room for your gear, whether you're traversing campus or tackling your favorite done-in-a-day scramble.
